column2: "Hey, <%me>. Sorry for troubling you the other day."
"Professor, I beg of you. Please don't run off on your own like that!"
"I know. But could you please just shut up?"
"As you can see, my assistant here is a wimpy little baby, so I've decided to scale back my field investigations."
"But to make up for it, I need someone who can go gather information in my place."
"You pick up quickly. My request is simple. I'd like you to go investigate in my stead."
"I say investigate, but it's really quite simple. I'd like you to examine the ecology."
"Particularly, I'd like you to observe a fight between the Dragonkin and Darkers."
"I'll leave the rest to you, Light!"
"Well that settles it, I guess your payment is coming out of my paycheck..."
